mainText:
I remember the first time I worked with a Mac, it was 93 I believe and 
it was an all green screen with huge floppy disks. At the time it was a 
learning aid for school, thats when I was 6. Now I'm 24 and in college 
and I use a Mac book pro for schooling. I had no idea the impact Steve 
Jobs and the Apple Corp would have on my education and future. I don't 
now if thank you is sufficient enough - but, Thank You. Thank you Steve 
for vesting your talents into technology that would improve education in 
another life. Your influence, talents, and generosity will be greatly 
missed. The world lost a gifted individual today.
author: Seth
